headline: American Express Weighs 2 World Trade Center Move And Long Term Costs
summary: American Express (NYSE:AXP) is reported to be nearing a decision to move its headquarters to 2 World Trade Center in Lower Manhattan. The relocation would anchor a long-planned skyscraper at the World Trade Center site and reshape the company’s New York office footprint. This potential move carries implications for American Express’s corporate presence, the Manhattan office market, and the ongoing redevelopment of the area. American Express, known for its global payments network and card...

headline: American Express (AXP) CEO is “So Good,” Says Jim Cramer
summary: We recently published Jim Cramer Discussed Trump, CEOs & These 10 Stocks. American Express Company (NYSE:AXP) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer discussed. American Express Company (NYSE:AXP)’s shares are up by 12% over the past year and are down by 3.8% year-to-date. BTIG raised the firm’s share price target to $328 from $307 and […]
